definition.text: Verify that the Testing Trading Tasks tasks for the corresponding Market were created successfully.

translations.text: Verifica que las tareas del Testing Trading Tasks del correspondiente Market fueron creados con Ã©xito.

paragraphs.text: Look for the following data structures:

translations.text: Busca las siguientes estructuras de datos:

paragraphs.text: A Market Trading Tasks node for the new market.

translations.text: Un nodo Market Trading Tasks para el nuevo mercado.

paragraphs.text: One Trading Mine Tasks node for each trading mine included in the Workspace.

translations.text: Un Trading Mine Tasks nodo para cada mina comercial incluida en el Workspace.

paragraphs.text: One Task Manager per trading mine and one Task with a Backtesting Session for each Trading System in the workspace.

translations.text: Un Task Manager por mina comercial y un Task con un Backtesting Session para cada  Trading System en el espacio de trabajo.
